sourceProperties.ExceptionInstructions: Add the security mark "allow_public_bucket_acl" to the asset with a value of "true" to prevent this finding from being activated again.
sourceProperties.Recommendation: Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/this-is-public-on-purpose, click on the Permissions tab, and remove "allUsers" and "allAuthenticatedUsers" from the bucket's members.
sourceProperties.Explanation: This bucket is public and can be accessed by anyone on the Internet. "allUsers" represents anyone on the Internet, and "allAuthenticatedUsers" represents anyone who is authenticated with a Google account; neither is constrained to users within your organization.
